meanings.definition: The quality or state of being volcanic.
meanings.sent1: The vulcanicities of the region were evident in the smoking crater.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the vulcanicities of different volcanic rocks.
meanings.sent3: The tourists were amazed by the vulcanicities of the erupting volcano.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for geology was like the intense vulcanicities bubbling beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The vulcanicities of the lava flow left a lasting impression on the landscape.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or features of a volcanic eruption.
meanings.sent1: The vulcanicities of the eruption included ash clouds and lava flows.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing the vulcanicities of the volcano was both terrifying and fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected vulcanicities of the eruption caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: The vulcanicities of the volcanic explosion painted the sky with fiery colors.
meanings.sent5: The vulcanicities of the eruption left a trail of destruction in their wake.
